text: 25|22|(avarkaḷ virumpiyavāṟu) vāṉavarkaḷai avarkaḷ kāṇum nāḷil, ikkuṟṟavāḷikaḷai nōkki ‘‘iṉṟaiya tiṉam (uṅkaḷukku aḻivait tavira) vēṟu oru nalla ceytiyum illai'' eṉṟu (avvāṉavarkaḷ) kūṟuvārkaḷ. (Akkuṟṟavāḷikaḷō taṅkaḷai aḻikka varum avvāṉavarkaḷait) ‘‘taṭuttuk koḷḷuṅkaḷ; taṭuttuk koḷḷuṅkaḷ'' eṉṟu captamiṭuvārkaḷ
